resources.string: Automatically review all shop orders from D Dining and Wechat etc
After enabled, all take-out orders of the shop will be checked automatically
Binding shop failed, please retry later...
The dish quantity you want to return is complete return, but the settlement quantity has not been returned completely
You\'ve not set return reasons, please set in D Manager
Settlement quantity you want to return is complete return, but the ordering quantity has not been returned completely
You\'ve not set cancellation reasons, please set in D Manager
You can manage in "D Manager" - "Left Column" - "POS Setting" - "Special Operation Reasons"
The chain headquarters and branches cannot use cloud POS temporarily
Cloud POS supports functions such as billing, ordering, settlement, table management and message processing etc., and can be used together with 2Dfire POS (catering version)
In "My" - "Shop I Work for", you can manage the shop I work for
Are you sure to select this shop?
Are you sure to clear sold-out?
Are you sure to delete this discount?
Are you sure to delete this payment?
Configure a printer printing receipts such as order, customer copy, accountant copy etc. If a network printer is used, the printer and the POS must be within the same LAN
The user with a phone number of %1$s has enabled it, and it will be disabled after your operation, are you sure to continue?
After this is disabled, the main POS will not display call information, are your sure to continue?

1. Collection details of Wechat, Alipay and QQ etc. within 24 hours will be displayed in electronic collection details.\n 2. If your shop has not opened 2Dfire collection service, no collection details will be displayed here
The electronic collections in recent 24 hours will be displayed here
After work, you cannot process orders or receive customer messages Are you sure to go off work?
Thanks for your hard work, going off work successfully
Press again to exit the application
Obtaining working status failed, please click to retry
Your gift quantity is all, but the gift weight is not all
The gift dish quantity exceeds ordered quantity
The gift dish quantity cannot be null
You\'ve not set giving reasons, please set in D Manager
Your gift weight is all, but the gift weight is not all
The gift dish weight exceeds ordered weight
You can manage in "D Manager" - "Left Column" - "POS Setting" - "Special Operation Reasons"
Note: Once free, such operation cannot be canceled, but only be deleted!
Go to the shop to get
You\'re not working, and cannot process orders or receive customer messages, are you sure to work?
The suspend orders in recent 2 hours will be displayed here
After refund of electronic payment, the payment will be returned to customer by the same route, are you sure to refund?
The input must be greater than 0!
Commodity unit price cannot be less than 0!
Commodity unit price must be greater than 0!
Commodity unit price cannot be null!
Commodity weight cannot be less than 0!
Commodity weight must be greater than 0!
Configure and print label paper used for pasting, which is suitable for milk tea shops and snack shops etc. If a network printer is used, the network printer and Cloud POS must be within the same LAN
You\'ve configured the label paper type in D Manager - POS Document Template, and please operate on D Manager for modification
Your favorite seat or order is displayed in message center by default
You can process orders and receive customer messages only after focusing
Manage in "Right Column" - "My Favorite Table or Order"
You\'ve not added favorite table or order
Sell-off quantity cannot be greater than 1000
Exception hints within 2 hours are displayed here
Are you sure to delete all favorite tables under %1$s?
Are you sure to reject to add dishes?
Scan code for adding dishes, %1$d dishes
Scan code for adding dishes, %1$d dishes
Scan code for adding dishes, %1$d dishes. %2$s Yuan paid, %3$s
Are you sure to mark new messages not required to be reviewed as processed (%1$d messages in all)? (Including payment and service bell messages)
You\'ve added the guest number, and the required commodities must be increased accordingly, please go to the shopping cart to confirm the order
You\'ve reduced the guest number, and the required commodities will not reduce automatically, please return dishes manually
You\'ve no shop available temporarily, please add in D Manager

"If you're an employee of the shop, please contact the manager to create employee and bind your mobile phone in ""D Manager"" - ""Employee Management""; if bound, please refresh the page or exit and login again"
No related order searched, please check before inputting
No related table searched, please check before inputting
The number of persons cannot be null!
This table is billed, and you can select to add dishes or cancel for this table, or change to another table
This table is billed, and you can select to add dishes for this table, or change table number
Please enter order no of retail order
Password must be a letter or number of 6-20 digits!
You have no "return" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "cancel" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "modify order" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "collection" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "clear discount" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "clear payment" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "electronic payment refund" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "billing" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "complete settlement" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "give" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "sell-off" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "print customer copy" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "print order" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "remind" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "remind" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "anti-settlement" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "modify service fee" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "modify price" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "modify weight" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
Optional, for us to provide feedback
Sir, please give an opinion anyhow
Are you sure to exit and logout?
Password you entered are inconsistent, please check carefully.
The main POS displays call information during an incoming call
After this is enabled, the main POS will display call information during an incoming call

Note: \n1. The configuration is bound with Cloud POS login user, please install Cloud POS on the mobile phone receiving the call and login this user. \n2. In order to ensure the main POS can display call information, please add Cloud POS into white list and make it enabled.
The password must be a combination of letters and numbers of 6-20 digits!
Please enter a 4-digit SMS verification code!
Please scan the table QR code
Please scan the QR code on the table
There\'re commodities with weight unconfirmed in the customer order, are you sure to continue the operation?
Please enter the correct IP address
You\'ve not installed D Manager, whether to install now?
Not settled retail orders have exceeded 50, please process as soon as possible.
Not settled retail orders have exceeded 100, unable to open any retail order.
You\'ve no favorite retail order, unable to process. You can add favorite on "My Favorite Tables" page.
The QR code you\'ve scanned is incorrect!

After the customer scanning this QR code with applications such as D Dining, Wechat, Alipay etc., he or she can open, order, settle and call waiter at mobile phone\n download table QR code under "D Manager" - "Basic Settings" - "Table"
The current QR code is not available\n\n please ensure the device is in the network
Obtaining table failed, please scan QR code again!
Receive service bell messages from D Dining and Wechat etc
Tip: The phone number and password set here can be used to login all applications of 2Dfire
Request the permission to add a camera
Camera permission requesting failed, please request again!
In order to use 2Dfire POS normally, please enable
Scan table code to select seat
The shop trial will be invalid in
The shop trial is finished, and you can use only after updating to a formal version
You\'ve not installed D Manager, whether to install now?
The collection amount must be greater than 0
The collection amount cannot be greater than 1 million
After closed, no push messages will be received
After rejecting order, the collection amount of the order will be returned by the same route, are you sure to reject the order?
The QR code you\'ve scanned is incorrect, please scan table QR code
Your account logins on another device, please login again
The verification code has been sent, please check
1. When this is disabled, it indicates to use D Cloud POS only \n2. When this is enabled, it indicates to use both D Cloud POS and D cash, which requires a Fire POS above V5.6.55.
Note: Please select the correct work mode according to actual situation, otherwise it will cause D Cloud POS or D cash unable to operate normally
If this is enabled, if you\'ve logged in D cash, please conduct shop login again, otherwise you will not obtain orders previously processed on D Cloud POS, which may cause inconsistent data
This mobile isn\'t registered. please set password and register. This account will bind the WeChat\'s account
This mobile have been registered. if you want bind WeChat\'s account, please do at the APP "D Dining"
There is no WeChat. Install now?
This mobile isn\'t registered. please set password and register
the scene: network printer is in the LAN Which contains main cashier machine, but don\'t contain cloud cashier.
print receipt with USB printer which is connecting main cashier machine
checked:it is checked by waiter\n cooked:it is printed to cooker
seat info must be not null
You can add the favorite table at the page of "ORDER"
Please enter serial No. or order No.
Are you sure to mark new messages not required to be reviewed as processed (%1$d messages in all)?
You have no "reprint a small ticket" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "billing receipt" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
You have no "bills" permission, and cannot continue this operation!
